alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 2:01PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Bay, southeastern Walton and Washington Counties through 245 PM EDT/145 PM CDT/... At 201 PM EDT/101 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 18 miles north of Panama City Beach to 16 miles west of Tyndall Air Force Base. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Panama City Beach, Callaway, Vernon, Springfield, Hiland Park, Tyndall Air Force Base, Bradford, Live Oak, Parker, Wausau, Ebro, Allanton, Dirego Park, College Station, Gulf Resort Beach, West Panama City, Bahama Beach and Holmes Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; Washington
